title: Go Hilton Program
description:
Family & Friends rates are part of the Go Hilton Team Member travel program. They are exclusively available to authorized family and friends of Hilton Team Members.

To book a Family & Friends rate, you'll need to create an Honors account. After you've created an account, a Hilton Team member can add you to their authorized family and friends list. Once added to their list, head over to the Go Hilton site to plan your next getaway.
